# Attaching the Vertical Battery Grip

> ðŸ’¡ **Note:**  
> Check that the camera is off before attaching or removing the vertical battery grip.

## 1. Remove the connector cover.

Remove the vertical battery grip connector cover from the camera (A) and the connector cover from the vertical battery grip (B).

!Removing Connector Cover

> ðŸ’¡ **Tip:**  
> The vertical battery grip connector cover of the camera (A) can be placed in the compartment for the connector cover. Store the connector cover of the vertical battery grip (B) so that it is not lost after removal.

## 2. Attach the vertical battery grip to the camera.

While hooking the hanging hook in the hole to hook the vertical battery grip on the camera (â‘ ), attach the vertical battery grip to the camera (â‘¡).
